漑字的基本解释

漑
gài
同“溉”。

漑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gài］
“溉1”的旧字形。

漑字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　漑； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页645第16
【唐韻】古代切【集韻】【韻會】居代切，?音槪。水名。【說文】水出東海桑瀆覆甑山。　又灌註也。【史記·河渠書】西門豹引漳水漑鄴。　又滌也。【詩·檜風】漑之釜?。　又沆漑，徐流也。【司馬相如·上林賦】滂濞沆漑。　又【廣韻】居豙切【集韻】【韻會】居氣切，?音旣。義同。　又與旣通。【史記·五帝紀】帝嚳漑執中，而徧天下。【註】古旣字。　又【集韻】戸代切。與瀣同。

補遺：【篇海類編】居大切，音蓋。仰塗也。與塈通。
漑字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
漑字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　漑; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 645 16
[Tang Yun] Ancient cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Judai cut,? Sound. Water name. [Said the text] Water flows out of the East China Sea, Sangdu covers Zengshan Mountain.　Infusion again. [Historical Records·Hequ Book] Ximen Leopard draws Zhangshui into the river.　It's also clean. 【Poetry·Hinofeng】The Cauldron of Suffering?.　Fuck again, Xu Liuye. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】Peng Lian Lian Lian.　 [Guang Yun] Ju Fengqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Ju Qiqie,? Yin Yang. The same meaning.　It's also connected with 旣. 【Historical Records·The Five Emperors】The emperor was in the middle of the ruling, and spread all over the world. [Note] Ancient Chinese characters.　[Jiyun] Do not cut on behalf of others. The same as Zong. Addendum: [Pian Hai Series] Judaqie, sound cover. Yangtu also. Connect with 塈.
